title: Bogosse
description: The name Bogosse comes from the French term, beau gosse, which is a traditional flattering translation for Handsome. It is often used when recognizing stylish and elegant gentlemen worldwide.Patrick Tardieu, world-class professional athlete, international business entrepreneur, traveler and connoisseur of the finest clothing designs, founded the company on a strong clear vision he had from a men's store visit in Paris.Since its inception in 2004, Bogosse has created a buzz and an undeniable imprint in the world of men's shirts and fashion. The brand perfectly expresses an European sensibility with a touch of playfulness that projects an elegant versatility which easily moves from the boardroom to the late-night scene. Bogosse always features the highest quality and sophisticated luxurious look while keeping a fun, comfortable and self-assured image.Bogosse products are crafted with unique custom European fabrics and prints. Each garment gives a perfect slimming fit complimented by its one of a kind hand-finished stitching and originally crafted new cuffs and collars from one season to the other. Each model offers either an original esthetics detail or simply a functional one that is guaranteed to draw attention and compliments.
review: Fantastic Work, Well managed code and nice sense of humor in User Interface
